Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the installation of water monitoring systems at class C high hazard dams
Summary: Relates to the installation of water monitoring systems at class C high hazard dams; provides requirements for the provision of information by water monitoring systems installed at certain dams about the water level and flood risk at such dams.
LawCode: Amd ยง1005-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the installation of water monitoring systems at class C high hazard dams
